channel.title: Notch on minecraft server?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ce0syd.jpg[/img]
Is this the real notch on the offical Moparscape server or is this just a admin that is trolling with us :P

item.title: Notch on minecraft server?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:13, topic:389617”][quote author=xryz link=topic=485528.msg3557644#msg3557644 date=1302024411]

Wait this is on the mopar server? Then probably not.

yh it is on the mopar server

Yeah its probably a fake then.

If its a bald guy with a goatee, then hes real, if he has default skin, its fake. The skin loading checks your pass and user still, so thats how tou can tell.

i dont believe that. the skin is received with just a username, no pass for it. you can test that out. my friend didnt have a minecraft account yet he had a custom skin.

edit: with the recent updates they must have changed it b/c u use to be able to access the skins just by typing in a url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/MinecraftSkins/“username”.png).
[/quote]
http://s3.amazonaws.com/MinecraftSkins/Notch.png works?[/quote]
true so does Davidi2, and anyone else that has a skin that capitalizes the first letter. like i thought i just didnt know you had to capitalize the name… so you dont need a password to get the skins.

Read full topic

item.title: Notch on minecraft server?

Wait this is on the mopar server? Then probably not.

yh it is on the mopar server

Yeah its probably a fake then.

If its a bald guy with a goatee, then hes real, if he has default skin, its fake. The skin loading checks your pass and user still, so thats how tou can tell.
[/quote]

i dont believe that. the skin is received with just a username, no pass for it. you can test that out. my friend didnt have a minecraft account yet he had a custom skin.

edit: with the recent updates they must have changed it b/c u use to be able to access the skins just by typing in a url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/MinecraftSkins/“username”.png).[/quote]
http://s3.amazonaws.com/MinecraftSkins/Notch.png works?

Read full topic

you guys are idiots you can use cracked client for my account and it will load skin…also he would shutdown server cause most of people dont give him gp

item.title: Notch on minecraft server?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:7, topic:389617”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=485528.msg3557586#msg3557586 date=1302020658]

Wait this is on the mopar server? Then probably not.

yh it is on the mopar server

Yeah its probably a fake then.
[/quote]
If its a bald guy with a goatee, then hes real, if he has default skin, its fake. The skin loading checks your pass and user still, so thats how tou can tell.[/quote]

i dont believe that. the skin is received with just a username, no pass for it. you can test that out. my friend didnt have a minecraft account yet he had a custom skin.

edit: with the recent updates they must have changed it b/c u use to be able to access the skins just by typing in a url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/MinecraftSkins/“username”.png).

Read full topic

item.title: Notch on minecraft server?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Minecraft Trivia - Notch has an account, what do you think will happen if you used a crack client to use his name? You’ll pull his skin data from the minecraft website of course.

Read full topic
